content:
### [Sovereign Search: intent and coherent fields]

1. **What If Particles Have Intention ? A New Framework for Scalar Field ...**
   URL: https://medium.com/@chucklovorn1/what-if-particles-have-intention-a-new-framework-for-scalar-field-coherence-c20c2035245d
   Snippet: Particles emerging from a high- coherence field will tend to seek participation in similarly ordered fields unless perturbed. This begins to model intention â€” not in a psychological sense, but as a directional bias rooted in phase resonance and field participation potential.

2. **(PDF) Predictive Intention Dynamics: A Neuropsychological...**
   URL: https://www.researchgate.net/publication/397607275_Predictive_Intention_Dynamics_A_Neuropsychological_Exploration_of_Intention_Coherence_and_Probability
   Snippet: Predictive Intention Dynamics: A Neuropsychological Exploration of Intention , Coherence , and Probability. November 2025.This manuscript introduces Predictive Intention Dynamics (PID), a unifying. framework explaining how intention , coherence , mindfulness, and predictive.

3. **Effect of conscious intention on human DNA**
   URL: https://emmind.net/scien/dist/Files/(16)+ConsciousIntentiononDNA.pdf
   Snippet: Popp believes coherent bio- fields are generating from light emitted from DNA, since his experimental data indicates DNA is capable of emitting coherent photons (Rattemeyer et al, 1981).
